Package devops.project

Class DataFrameStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • devops.project.DataFrameStatistics
  • public class DataFrameStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    The DataFrameStatistics class provides statistical methods for a DataFrame. It allows for calculating the sum, mean, min, and max of numeric columns.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DataFrameStatistics​(DataFrame dataFrame)
      Constructs a DataFrameStatistics object with the given DataFrame.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double max​(java.lang.String columnName)
      Calculates the maximum value of a numeric column in the DataFrame.
      double mean​(java.lang.String columnName)
      Calculates the mean of a numeric column in the DataFrame.
      double min​(java.lang.String columnName)
      Calculates the minimum value of a numeric column in the DataFrame.
      double sum​(java.lang.String columnName)
      Calculates the sum of a numeric column in the DataFrame.
